org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net

类 NioInetPeer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.NioInetPeer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.Peer

    public class NioInetPeer
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.Peer
    Represents a peer that we communicate with by using non-blocking I/O on a Socket.

      • hasSecureChannel

        public boolean hasSecureChannel()
        从接口复制的说明: org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.Peer
        Return true if the channel is secure.
        指定者:
        hasSecureChannel 在接口中 org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.Peer
        返回:
        True if our channel to this peer is not susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks.
